DOC.brief_summary: Monocentric study. Objective : Determination of the repeatability of fluorocholine PET/CT in prostate cancer
DOC.brief_title: Repeatability of Positron Emission Tomography (TEP) With fluorométhyl-(18F)-diméthyl-2-hydroxyéthyl-ammonium
DOC.criteria: biological suspicion of relapse of prostate cancer or/ initial staging of prostate cancer
